content.text:
# Draft:1904–05 Queens Park Rangers F.C. season

The 1904–05 Queens Park Rangers season was the club's 17th season of existence and their 6th season in the Southern League Division One, the top non-league division of football in England at the time. Qpr also competed in the 1904–05 Western Football League.
Season summary
In the 1904–05 season QPR continued play in the Southern League Division One and Finished 7th whilst in the Western league, Qpr finished 11th.
